thread.title: Sybil Morial's 'Witness to Change: From Jim Crow to Political Empowerment' book signing at NOMA
thread.title_full: Sybil Morial's 'Witness to Change: From Jim Crow to Political Empowerment' book signing at NOMA | NOLA.com

author: Sue Strachan, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune
title: Sybil Morial's 'Witness to Change: From Jim Crow to Political Empowerment' book signing at NOMA
text:
Civil Rights activist, wife and mother to two New Orleans Mayors, Sybil Haydel Morial, the daughter of a New Orleans physician, has been an eyewitness to and participant in history.
On Thursday (Oct. 1), a book signing for Morial's "Witness to Change: From Jim Crow to Political Empowerment" (John Blair Publishers) attracted family â€“ three of her five children, Hon. Monique Morial, Jacques Morial and Dr. Julie Morial -- and friends, such as Leah Chase, to New Orleans of Museum of Art .
Morial took to the stage to read passages from the book, recount stories, and take questions from the audience. She followed this book signing with ones at the Garden District Book Shop Monday (Oct. 5) and Octavia Books Tuesday (Oct. 6).
*
